description.@en: Guttersnipes were orphaned on the streets and thieve to eat and survive. Some even take up ‘trades’ – such as a chimneysweep or ragpicker– casing joints underneath the guise of an honestworking citizen.

effect.@en: You automatically gain every Focus in the Stealth Skill when you enter this Profession. This means you may exceed the normal limits for Focuses set by your [IB], but for Stealth only.
